title: Rio 2 2014 1080p 3D BluRay HalfSBS DTS x264 ThD DualAudio Highvo
description:
It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jade and her three children in RIO 2, after they leave the wonderful city to venture on a trip to Brazil to get on Amazon, for a family reunion. Away from home, in an unfamiliar place, Blu will have to face his greatest fear - his father - while seeking to escape the vengeance of Nigel plan. All the favorite characters from RIO are back, and now, new voices and new artists are part of the cast.
